code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";var UserAPI={getDetailData:function getDetailData(id){var url="/users/username?userId=".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},getUser:function getUser(id){var url="/users/user/fetch?userId=".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},postSignUp:function postSignUp(query){var url="/users/signup/".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},postLogin:function postLogin(query){var url="/users/login/".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},postUpdateInfor:function postUpdateInfor(body,token){var url="/users/update";return axiosClient.post(url,body,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},postChangePassword:function postChangePassword(body,token){var url="/users/changepassword";return axiosClient.post(url,body,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});}};export default UserAPI;
